metadata.title: simplified | Apple Developer Documentation
metadata.author: Apple Inc.
metadata.summary: Apple Developer Documentation page describing the 'simplified' static property of the LevelOfDetail type in WidgetKit. This property indicates that widgets should display simplified content, particularly relevant for visionOS when users are at a further distance.
metadata.copyright: Copyright 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

layout.description: Three-column layout with navigation header, left sidebar navigation, main content area, and comprehensive footer

content.text: Increasing the visibility of widgets i...
Creating views for widgets, Live Acti...
The level of detail should be simplified.
This suggests the app should lay out its content and show a simplified version of its content. On visionOS specifically, this signals that the user is at a further distance.
To submit feedback on documentation, visit Feedback Assistant.
Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

pages.pageSummary: Apple Developer Documentation page for the 'simplified' static type property in WidgetKit's LevelOfDetail structure. The page is displayed in dark mode with a three-column layout: left sidebar with WidgetKit framework navigation, main content area with API documentation, and a comprehensive footer with links to Apple Developer resources. The API was introduced in iOS 26.0, iPadOS 26.0, Mac Catalyst, and visionOS 26.0. The property indicates that widget content should be displayed in a simplified manner, particularly useful for visionOS when users are at a greater viewing distance.

semanticStructure.documentFlow: The document follows Apple's standard developer documentation layout. Users first see the navigation header, then can use the left sidebar to navigate the WidgetKit framework hierarchy. The main content area presents the API documentation in a structured format: breadcrumb path, type label, property name, brief description, platform availability, code declaration, related article references, and detailed discussion. The footer provides extensive links to other Apple Developer resources.

keyTerms.definition: A static property of LevelOfDetail that indicates the app should display a simplified version of its content
A WidgetKit type that represents different levels of detail for widget content rendering
Apple's framework for building widgets on iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and watchOS
Apple's operating system for spatial computing devices (Vision Pro)
A static property that belongs to the type itself rather than instances of the type

keyFindings: The 'simplified' property is available starting from iOS 26.0, iPadOS 26.0, Mac Catalyst, and visionOS 26.0
On visionOS, 'simplified' signals that the user is at a further viewing distance from the widget
Apps should lay out their content differently when this level of detail is indicated
This property is part of the WidgetKit framework's presentation system
The feature is related to updating widgets for visionOS compatibility
designDecisions: The simplified level of detail is designed specifically for scenarios where users view widgets from a distance
visionOS spatial computing context requires adaptive content presentation based on user distance
Widget content should adapt its complexity based on viewing context
